info.name: Broker API
info.description:
Alpaca Broker API consists of different APIs that help you build your investment services and products depending on your needs.

| Environment   | URL                                        |
| ------------- |:------------------------------------------:|
| Sandbox       | https://broker-api.sandbox.alpaca.markets/ |
| Production    | https://broker-api.alpaca.markets/         |

For complete documentation on the Broker API and to obtain your keys head to https://alpaca.markets/docs/broker/introduction/. Once you have your keys, head to the environments tab to quickly get started.

item.name: Accounts

request.description:
| Attribute         | Requirement     |
| -------------     |:-------------:  |
| `contact`         | Required        |
| `identity`        | Required        |
| `disclosures`     | Required        |
| `documents`       | Optional        |
| `trusted_contact` | Optional        |

| Attribute      | Requirement     |
| ---------------|:-------------:  |
| `provider`     | Optional        |
| `kyc`          | Optional        |
| `document`     | Optional        |
| `photo`        | Optional        |
| `identity`     | Optional        |
| `watchlist`    | Optional        |

query.description: Pass space-delimited tokens. The response will contain accounts that match with each of the tokens (logical AND). A match means the token is present in either the accountâ€™s associated account number, phone number, name, or e-mail address (logical OR).
asc or desc. Defaults to desc
Comma-delimited entity names to include in the response
Both formats YYYY-MM-DD and YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ supported.
Both formats YYYY-MM-DD and YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ supported. Cannot be used with date.

item.name: ACH Relationships

request.description:
| Parameter             | Type   | Requirement | Notes             |
| ----------------------|--------|-------------|:-----------------:|
| `account_owner_name`  | string | Required    |                   |
| `bank_account_type`   | string | Required    | Must be `CHECKINGS` or `SAVINGS` |
| `bank_account_number` | string | Required    | In sandbox, this must be valid format |
| `bank_routing_number` | string | Required    | In sandbox, this must be valid format                  |
| `nickname`            | string | Optional    |                   |

item.description: Head to https://alpaca.markets/docs/broker/api-references/funding/ach/ to view complete documentation on the ACH Relationships API.

item.name: Banks

request.description:
| Parameter        | Type                | Requirement | Notes             |
| -----------------|---------------------|-------------|:-----------------:|
| `name`           | string              | Required    | Name of recipient bank |
| `bank_code_type` | enum.IdentifierType | Required    | `ABA`(Domestic) or `BIC`(International) |
| `bank_code`      | string              | Required    | 9-Digit ABA RTN (Routing Number or BIC |
| `country`        | string              | Required    | Only for international banks |
| `state_province` | string              | Required    | Only for international banks |
| `postal_code`    | string              | Required    | Only for international banks |
| `city`           | string              | Required    | Only for international banks |
| street_address | string              | Required    | Only for international banks |
| account_number | string              | Required    |                   |

item.description: Head to https://alpaca.markets/docs/broker/api-references/funding/bank/ to view complete documentation on the Bank API.

item.name: Transfers

request.description:
| Parameter              | Type                   | Required                | Notes |
|------------------------|------------------------|-------------------------|:-----:|
| `transfer_type`          | ENUM.TransferType      | Required                | Sandbox currently only supports `ach` |
| `relationship_id`        | string/UUID            | Required if `type = ach`  | The `ach_relationship` created for the `account_id` here |
| `bank_id`                | string/UUID            | Required if `type = wire` | The `bank_relationship` created for the `account_id` here |
| `amount`                 | string/decimal         | Required                | Must be > 0.00 |
| `direction`              | ENUM.TransferDirection | Required                | |
| `timing`                 | ENUM.TransferTiming    | Required                | Only `immediate` |
| `additional_information` | string                 | Optional - Applies only to wires | Additional wire details |

item.description: Head to https://alpaca.markets/docs/broker/api-references/funding/transfers/ to view complete documentation on the Transfers API.

item.name: Journals

request.description:
| Attribute                         | Type           | Requirement | Notes |
|-----------------------------------|----------------|-------------|:-----:|
| `to_account`                        | string         | Required    | The `account_id` you wish to journal to |
| `from_account`                      | string         | Required    | the `account_id you` wish to journal from |
| `entry_type`                        | string         | Required    | ENUM: `JNLC` or `JNLS` |
| `amount`                            | string/numeric | Required    | Required if `entry_type = JNLC` |
| `symbol`                            | string         | Required    | Required if `entry_type = JNLS` |
| `qty`                               | string/numeric | Required    | Required if `entry_type = JNLS` |
| `description`                       | string         | Optional    | Max 1024 characters. Can include fixtures for amounts that are above the transaction limit |
| `transmitter_name`                  | string         | Optional    | Max 255 characters. See more details about Travel Rule. |
| `transmitter_account_number`        | string         | Optional    | Max 255 characters. See more details about Travel Rule. |
| `transmitter_address`               | string         | Optional    | Max 255 characters. See more details about Travel Rule. |
| `transmitter_financial_institution` | string         | Optional    | Max 255 characters. See more details about Travel Rule. |
| `transmitter_timestamp`             | string         | Optional    | RFC 3339 format. See more details about Travel Rule. |

| Attribute      | Type          | Requirement                           | Notes                                                           |
| -------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `entry_type`   | string        | Required | ENUM: `JNLC` or `JNLS`                                          |
| `from_account` | string        | Required | The originator of funds. Most likely is your Sweep Firm Account |
| `to_account`   | string        | Required | The ID of the `to_account` that you want to journal into        |
| `amount`       | string/number | Required | Journal amount in `USD`                                         |
| `description`  | string        | Optional | Journal description, gets returned in the response              |

| Attribute      | Type          | Requirement                           | Notes                                                            |
| -------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `entry_type`   | string        | Required | ENUM: `JNLC` or `JNLS`                                           |
| `to_account`   | string        | Required | The destination of funds. Most likely is your Sweep Firm Account |
| `from_account` | string        | Required | The ID of the `from_account` that you want to journal from       |
| `amount`       | string/number | Required | Journal amount in `USD`                                          |
| `description`  | string        | Optional   | Journal description, gets returned in the response               |

query.description: The account that received the journal
The account that received the journal
The account that initiated the journal

item.description: Head to https://alpaca.markets/docs/broker/api-references/journals/ to view complete documentation on the Journals API.

item.name: OAuth

request.description:
| Attribute         | Type   | Notes                                  |
| ----------------- | ------ | -------------------------------------- |
| `response_type`   | string | ENUM: `code` or `token`                |
| `redirect_uri`    | string | Redirect URI of the OAuth flow         |
| `scope`           | string | Requested scopes by the OAuth flow     |

| Attribute         | Type           | Requirement                           | Notes                          |
| ----------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `client_id`       | string         | Required | OAuth `client_id`                |
| `client_secret`   | string         | Required | OAuth `client_secret`            |
| `redirect_uri`    | string         | Required | Redirect URI of OAuth flow     |
| `scope`           | string/numeric | Required | Requested scopes by OAuth flow |
| `account_id`      | string         | Required | UUID of end user               |

| Attribute         | Type           | Requirement                           | Notes                          |
| ----------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `client_id`       | string         | Required | OAuth `client_id`               |
| `client_secret`   | string         | Required | OAuth `client_secret`            |
| `redirect_uri`    | string         | Required | Redirect URI of OAuth flow     |
| `scope`          | string/numeric | Required | Requested scopes by OAuth flow |
| `account_id`      | string         | Required | UUID of end user               |

item.description: Head to https://alpaca.markets/docs/broker/api-references/oauth/ to view complete documentation on the OAuth API.
